name: Venonat
flavorText: Its big eyes are actually clusters of tiny eyes. At night, its kind is drawn by light.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Venomoth
flavorText: The scales it scatters will paralyze anyone who touches them, making that person unable to stand.
Attack1Text: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card from his or her hand during his or her next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that card has no effect. (Your opponent still discards that card.)
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused and Poisoned.

name: Yanma
flavorText: Its eyes can see 360 degrees without moving its head. It won't miss preyâ€”even those behind it.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Yanmega
flavorText: It prefers to battle by biting apart foes' heads instantly while flying by at high speed.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon was on the Bench and became your Active Pokemon this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Sewaddle
flavorText: This Pokemon makes clothes for itself. It chews up leaves and sews them with sticky thread extruded from its mouth.
Attack1Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Swadloon
flavorText: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Leavanny
flavorText: Upon finding a small Pokemon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves by using the sticky silk secreted from its mouth.
Attack1Text: Choose up to 2 of your Benched Pokemon that have no Pokemon Tools attached to them. For each of those Pokemon, search your deck for a Pokemon Tool card, and attach it to that Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Heal 20 damage from each of your Grass Pokemon.

name: Karrablast
flavorText: These mysterious Pokemon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Fletchinder
flavorText: From its beak, it expels embers that set the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.

name: Talonflame
flavorText: In the fever of an exciting battle, it showers embers from the gaps between its feathers and takes to the air.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is increased by 40 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Litleo
flavorText: The stronger the opponent it faces, the more heat surges from its mane and the more power flows through its body.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Pyroar
flavorText: The male with the largest mane of fire is the leader of the pride.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy attached to this Pokemon. If you do, switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with his or her Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This Pokemon does 30 damage to itself.

name: Krabby
flavorText: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger.

name: Kingler
flavorText: The large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokemon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Totodile
flavorText: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Croconaw
flavorText: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Feraligatr
flavorText: It usually moves slowly, but it goes at blinding speed when it attacks and bites prey.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

name: Finneon
flavorText: The line running down its side can store sunlight. It shines vividly at night.

name: Lumineon
flavorText: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Pokemon, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

name: Frillish
flavorText: They paralyze prey with poison, then drag them down to their lairs, five miles below the surface.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Jellicent
flavorText: Its body is mostly seawater. It's said there's a castle of ships Jellicent have sunk on the seafloor.
Attack1Text: Attach 3 Energy cards from your opponent's discard pile to his or her Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Alomomola
flavorText: Floating in the open sea is how they live. When they find a wounded Pokemon, they embrace it and bring it to shore.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon. Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Manectric-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: M Manectric-EX
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: M Manectric-EX
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Pachirisu
flavorText: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokemon's Weakness is now Lightning until the end of your next turn. (The amount of Weakness doesn't change.)
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Joltik
flavorText: Since it can't generate its own electricity, it sticks onto large-bodied Pokemon and absorbs static electricity.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokemon in your discard pile that have the Night March attack.

name: Galvantula
flavorText: They employ an electrically charged web to trap their prey. While it is immobilized by shock, they leisurely consume it.
Attack1Text: Switch 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon with your opponent's Active Pokemon. The new Active Pokemon is now Confused.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokemon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Helioptile
flavorText: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Helioptile
flavorText: They make their home in deserts. They can generate their energy from basking in the sun, so eating food is not a requirement.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Heliolisk
flavorText: They flare their frills and generate energy. A single Heliolisk can generate sufficient electricity to power a skyscraper.
Attack2Text: Discard as many Lightning Energy attached to your Pokemon as you like. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.

name: Zubat
flavorText: Even though it has no eyes, it can sense obstacles using ultrasonic waves it emits from it mouth.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Golbat
flavorText: Once it bites, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may put 2 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Crobat
flavorText: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.
Ability1Text: When you play this Pokemon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokemon, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack1Text: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gengar-EX
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: M Gengar-EX
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Wobbuffet
flavorText: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to build up its counterstrike.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, each Pokemon in play, in each player's hand, and in each player's discard pile has no Abilities (except for Psychic Pokemon).
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 more damage for each damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Gulpin
flavorText: It has a small heart and brain. Its stomach compromises most of its body, with enzymes to dissolve anything.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Swalot
flavorText: It swallows anything whole. It sweats toxic fluids from its follicles to douse foes.
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If, before doing damage, your opponent's Active Pokemon has fewer remaining HP than this Pokemon, this attack does 50 more damage.

name: Munna
flavorText: This Pokemon appears before people and Pokemon who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.
Attack1Text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Musharna
flavorText: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Shuffle 3 cards from your discard pile into your deck.
Attack2Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Asleep.

name: Litwick
flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Lampent
flavorText: The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting for people to pass on.
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokemon in your discard pile that have the Night March attack.

name: Chandelure
flavorText: Being consumed in Chandelure's flame burns up the spirit, leaving the body behind.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon is Knocked Out by damage from an opponent's attack, flip a coin. If heads, the Attacking Pokemon is Knocked Out.
Attack1Text: Put 6 damage counters on your opponent's Pokemon in any way you like.

name: Pumpkaboo
flavorText: The pumpkin body is inhabited by a spirit trapped in this world. As the sun sets, it becomes restless and active.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Pokemon in your discard pile that have the Night March attack.

name: Gourgeist
flavorText: Singing in eerie voices, they wander town streets on the night of the new moon. Anyone who hears their song is cursed.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has any Grass Energy attached to it, its maximum HP is 200.
Attack1Text: This attack does 10 damage times the number of cards in your hand.

name: Gligar
flavorText: It usually clings to cliffs. When it spots its prey, it spreads its wings and glides down to attack.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Gliscor
flavorText: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't attach Energy from his or her hand to the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned.

name: Roggenrola
flavorText: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
flavorText: Because its energy was too great to be contained, the energy leaked and formed orange crystals.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fighting Energy attached to this Pokemon and heal 50 damage from it.

name: Gigalith
flavorText: The solar rays it absorbs are processed in its energy core and fired as a ball of light.
Ability1Text: If this Pokemon has full HP, any damage done to this Pokemon by an opponent's attack is reduced by 50 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: During your next turn, this Pokemon's Overdrive Smash attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Murkrow
flavorText: It hides any shiny object it finds in a secret location. Murkrow and Meowth loot one another's stashes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Honchkrow
flavorText: If one utters a deep cry, many Murkrow gather quickly. For this, it is called "Summoner of Night."
Attack1Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon is Asleep, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Poochyena
flavorText: A Pokemon with a persistent nature, it chases its chosen prey until the prey becomes exhausted.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Mightyena
flavorText: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs in ancient times.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Spiritomb
flavorText: A Pokemon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.
Attack1Text: Your opponent can't play any Pokemon from his or her hand to evolve the Defending Pokemon during his or her next turn.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Purrloin
flavorText: Its cute act is a ruse. When victims let down their guard, they find their items taken. It attacks with sharp claws.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Liepard
flavorText: Their beautiful form comes from the muscles they have developed. They run silently in the night.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 60 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Malamar-EX
Ability1Text: When you attach an Energy from your hand to this Pokemon, you may use this Ability. Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

name: Skarmory
flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
Attack2Text: Discard a Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Bronzor
flavorText: Ancient people believed that the pattern on Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
flavorText: In ages past, this Pokemon was revered as a bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Metal Energy card from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Dialga-EX
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon-EX, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Heatran
flavorText: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.
Attack1Text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Escavalier
flavorText: Wearing the shell covering they stole from Shelmet, they defend themselves and attack with two lances.
Attack1Text: Discard a random card from your opponent's hand.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

name: Aegislash-EX
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from each of your opponent's Pokemon that has any Special Energy attached to it.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Aegislash-EX
Ability1Text: Prevent all damage done to this Pokemon by attacks from each of your opponent's Pokemon that has Special Energy attached to it.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 more damage for each Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Klefki
flavorText: These key collectors threaten any attackers by fiercely jingling their keys at them.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Florges-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Grass Pokemon and Fairy Pokemon you have in play.

name: Swirlix
flavorText: To entangle its opponents in battle, it extrudes white threads as sweet and as sticky as cotton candy.
Attack1Text: Remove all Special Conditions from this Pokemon.

name: Slurpuff
flavorText: It can distinguish the faintest of scents. It puts its sensitive sense of smell to use by helping pastry chefs in their work.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may draw a card. If this Pokemon is your Active Pokemon, draw 1 more card.
Attack1Text: Prevent all effects of your opponent's attacks, except damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Dedenne
flavorText: Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and receiving electrical waves, it can communicate with others over vast distances.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.
Attack2Text: Heal 20 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Diancie
flavorText: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Heal 30 damage from each of your Fairy Pokemon.

name: Deino
flavorText: They cannot see, so they tackle and bite to learn about their surroundings. Their bodies are covered in wounds.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

name: Zweilous
flavorText: The two heads do not get along. Whichever head eats more than the other gets to be the leader.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

name: Hydreigon
flavorText: Their heads on their arms do not have brains. They use all three heads to consume and destroy everything.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Darkness Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokemon.

name: Goomy
flavorText: The weakest Dragon-type Pokemon, it lives in damp, shady places, so its body doesn't dry out.
Attack1Text: Heal 10 damage from this Pokemon

name: Sliggoo
flavorText: It drives away opponents by excreting a sticky liquid that can dissolve anything. Its eyes devolved, so it can't see anything.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.

name: Goodra
flavorText: This very friendly Dragon-type Pokemon will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving that Trainer covered in sticky slime.
Ability1Text: Each player can't attach any Pokemon Tool cards from his or her hand to any of his or her Pokemon.
Attack1Text: Discard the top card of your deck.

name: Spearow
flavorText: Very protective of its territory, it flaps its short wings busily to dart around at high speed.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.

name: Fearow
flavorText: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land or rest.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokemon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Chansey
flavorText: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its egg with injured people.
Attack1Text: Heal 30 damage from this Pokemon.
Attack2Text: If you don't have exactly 7 cards in your hand, this attack does nothing.

name: Blissey
flavorText: The eggs it lays are filled with happiness. Eating even one bite will bring a smile to anyone.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage times the number of damage counters on each of your Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: You may do 20 more damage. If you do, this Pokemon does 20 damage to itself.

name: Girafarig
flavorText: While it sleeps, the head of its tail keeps watch. The tail doesn't need to sleep.
Attack2Text: If this Pokemon has any Psychic Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Whismur
flavorText: It usually murmurs but starts crying loudly if it senses danger. It stops when its ear covers are shut.
Attack1Text: Both Active Pokemon are now Confused.

name: Loudred
flavorText: It shouts loudly by inhaling air, and then using its well-developed stomach muscles to exhale.
Attack2Text: This attack does 30 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.

name: Exploud
flavorText: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Regigigas
flavorText: It is said to have made Pokemon that look like itself from a special ice mountain, rocks, and magma.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done by attacks from the Defending Pokemon is reduced by 40 (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Bunnelby
flavorText: They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

name: Diggersby
flavorText: With their powerful ears, they can heft boulders of a ton or more with ease. They can be a big help at construction sites.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokemon.
Attack2Text: This attack does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Fletchling
flavorText: These friendly Pokemon send signals to one another with beautiful chirps and tail-feather movements.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

name: Furfrou
flavorText: Trimming its fluffy fur not only makes it more elegant but also increases the swiftness of its movements.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Head Ringer Team Flare Hyper Gear
Jamming Net Team Flare Hyper Gear
Manectric-EX
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokemon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)
Attack2Text: If your opponent's Active Pokemon has a Pokemon Tool card attached to it, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Gengar-EX
Attack1Text: Put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.
Attack2Text: Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Poisoned. Switch this Pokemon with 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: Malamar-EX
Ability1Text: When you attach an Energy from your hand to this Pokemon, you may use this Ability. Your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Energy attached to this Pokemon. This attack does 60 damage times the number of heads.

name: Florges-EX
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Grass Pokemon and Fairy Pokemon you have in play.

name: M Manectric-EX
Attack1Text: Attach 2 basic Energy cards from your discard pile to 1 of your Benched Pokemon.

name: M Gengar-EX
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon's attacks and use it as this attack.

name: Dialga-EX
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokemon is a Pokemon-EX, it can't attack during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Metal Energy attached to this Pokemon.
